page.title: Import Pathway
page.introduction: Import a biochemical pathway network from a local file or from an online database of biochemical reactions and kinetics

operations.para: Selecting the Import Pathway menu item yields a submenu to choose between importing a biochemical reaction pathway from an web database (e.g. Sabio-RK), a local file, or to try one of several built-in examples.
Using the example to illustrate, select a pathway.
Once selected, the example pathway can then be either Previewed or imported
Preview in either raw data markup or tree view is available:
